label: WebApiSkill
description: A skill that can call a Web API endpoint, allowing you to extend a skillset by having it call your custom code.

fields.label: Auth Identity
fields.tooltip: The user-assigned managed identity used for outbound connections. If an authResourceId is provided and it's not specified, the system-assigned managed identity is used. On updates to the indexer, if the identity is unspecified, the value remains unchanged. If set to "none", the value of this property is cleared.

fields.label: Auth Resource ID
fields.tooltip: Applies to custom skills that connect to external code in an Azure function or some other application that provides the transformations. This value should be the application ID created for the function or app when it was registered with Azure Active Directory. When specified, the custom skill connects to the function or app using a managed ID (either system or user-assigned) of the search service and the access token of the function or app, using this value as the resource id for creating the scope of the access token.

fields.label: Batch Size
fields.tooltip: The desired batch size which indicates number of documents.

fields.label: Degree Of Parallelism
fields.tooltip: If set, the number of parallel calls that can be made to the Web API.

fields.label: HTTP Headers
fields.tooltip: The headers required to make the http request.

fields.label: HTTP Method
fields.tooltip: The method for the http request.

fields.label: Timeout
fields.tooltip: The desired timeout for the request. Default is 30 seconds.

fields.label: URI
fields.tooltip: The url for the Web API.
